data.actual_result: The same suggestions are kept on the page briefly, but noticably until they're regenerated.
data.expected_result: When the picker reloads, the suggestions should regenerate before the suggestion area reappears.
data.short_description: If you use a suggestion in the GIF Picker, you're able to scroll down and see the same suggestions briefly before it either disappears or changes to new suggestions.
data.steps_to_repro: - Search something in the GIF Picker that would make suggestions appear at the bottom of the picker (I used "3000") - Scroll all the way down and wait for the suggestions to appear. ("Your perfect GIF is in another castle.") - Click a suggestion. - Scroll back to the bottom of the picker.
